label: Export directory
help: Path where your sega model 3 set will be created (original set will be left untouched)

label: Mame dat
help: Path to your mame dat, leave empty if you do not have it

label: Images folder
help: Paths to your images set, leave empty if you do not have it

label: Dry run
help: Check this to generate only dat and CSV files, no roms will be copied

label: Use genre subfolders
help: Check to use genre subfolders for roms

label: Scrape images
help: Check to use images for games and folders

label: Exclude CHD Games
help: Check to exclude CHD games from generation

label: Verify
help: Check that your paths are okay

label: Confirm
help: Your output dir is {outputDir}#nIts content will be erased.#nIf you don't want to proceed, close this window, or click Cancel
